verbs.description: [ARG1: Barack Obama] [V: was] [ARG2: a deeply flawed president] [ARGM-MNR: in many ways] . I spent much of the time he was in office hammering him for his appalling use of the State Secrets Privilege and his refusal to hold anyone accountable for torture . But a pair of tweets by Obama and Trump put the difference between them on …
